list_definition.definition: the best or most memorable event, experience, part of something etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The highlight of our holiday was a trip to a waterfall.

list_definition.definition: to draw particular attention to (a person, thing etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The article highlights the need to improve the city’s transport links.

list_ex_of_english: The flavour of the book is best illustrated by reviewing a few highlights from each chapter.
We want to know what potential groups are ignored in taxonomies as well as what groups are highlighted.
While it is recommended that a full proposal be developed from this outline bid, it must concentrate on highlighting new initiatives.
The author highlights the importance of behavioural support in addition to any biological treatments.
The need for further research to quantify environmental benefits is thus highlighted.
A persistent difficulty of interdisciplinary cooperation is thus highlighted - members of one field run into difficulty when they try to comment on another.
Although this part of the book is fascinating, it highlights a deficiency.

Alterity can be deleted, highlighted or concealed through enunciative operations of location (subjective and inter-subjective location, spatial temporal location, quantitative and qualitative determinations).
